statements: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id FROM employees WHERE employee_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 100
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager'
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees WHERE employee_id BETWEEN 200 AND 300
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Developer' OR employee_role = 'Designer'
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE date = '2023-10-15';
SELECT employee_name, start_time, end_time FROM schedules JOIN employees ON schedules.employee_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, date, start_time, end_time FROM employees INNER JOIN schedules ON employees.employee_id = schedules.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, start_time, end_time FROM employees INNER JOIN schedules ON employees.employee_id = schedules.employee_id WHERE start_time < '09:00:00';
SELECT employee_name, date, start_time, end_time FROM employees INNER JOIN schedules ON employees.employee_id = schedules.employee_id WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM actors ORDER BY actor_name DESC;
SELECT actor_name, hire_date FROM actors WHERE actor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM crew_members WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT staff_name FROM administrative_staff WHERE staff_id = 3;
SELECT staff_id, staff_name FROM administrative_staff ORDER BY staff_id ASC;
SELECT actor_name FROM actors WHERE actor_id = 1;
SELECT staff_name, hire_date FROM administrative_staff WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT crew_name FROM crew_members WHERE crew_id % 2 = 0 ORDER BY crew_name DESC;
SELECT actor_name, hire_date FROM actors JOIN administrative_staff ON actors.actor_id = administrative_staff.staff_id WHERE actors.hire_date < '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM crew_members WHERE crew_name LIKE 'J%' AND hire_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM actors;
SELECT actor_name, role FROM actors WHERE actor_id = 1;
SELECT crew_name, position FROM crew_members ORDER BY crew_id DESC;
SELECT staff_name, department FROM administrative_staff WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE date = '2023-01-15' AND start_time > '09:00:00';
SELECT * FROM actors;
SELECT actor_id, actor_name FROM actors WHERE role = 'Lead Actor';
SELECT crew_name, position FROM crew_members ORDER BY crew_name ASC;
SELECT staff_name, department FROM administrative_staff WHERE department = 'Marketing' ORDER BY staff_name DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, date, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Actors;
SELECT actor_name, actor_salary FROM Actors WHERE actor_salary > 5000;
SELECT crew_name, crew_position FROM CrewMembers ORDER BY crew_position DESC;
SELECT staff_name, staff_role FROM AdminStaff WHERE staff_role = 'Manager' AND schedule_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, employee_salary FROM Employees WHERE employee_type = 'Full-time' ORDER BY employee_salary ASC;
SELECT actor_name, actor_salary FROM Actors WHERE actor_salary > 5000 ORDER BY actor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM CrewMembers WHERE crew_position = 'Director' AND crew_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY crew_id;
SELECT staff_name, staff_role, schedule_date FROM AdminStaff INNER JOIN Schedules ON AdminStaff.schedule_id = Schedules.schedule_id WHERE schedule_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY schedule_date ASC;

SELECT actor_name, actor_salary, Schedules.schedule_date FROM Actors INNER JOIN Schedules ON Actors.schedule_id = Schedules.schedule_id WHERE Schedules.schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY actor_salary DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, employee_salary, employee_type FROM Employees WHERE employee_salary < 4000 ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
